body: I don't think that many people know me and I just got Junior Mod so feel free to ask any questions ;P
body_tagged: I don't think that many people know me and I just got Junior Mod so feel free to ask any questions ;P
title: Whittleby - AMA

replies.body: What was your response after you were accepted?
replies.body_tagged: What was your response after you were accepted?

replies.body:
Were you nervous at your interview?
Why do you want to be a staffmember/moderator?
replies.body_tagged:
Were you nervous at your interview?
Why do you want to be a staffmember/moderator?

replies.body: Would you leave Avicus if you were denied as a Moderator?
replies.body_tagged: Would you leave Avicus if you were denied as a Moderator?

replies.body:
@SirCyanide - Thanks dude! Argh probably chocolate

@Gallant - I was actually really surprised that I got accepted then obviously really happy

@resepignev - Yeah I was a bit nervous to start with and I wanted to be a staff member to help out the community and get more involved

@nintendoboy11 - No definitely not

@Fuseh - One of my friends first introduced me to the server. My first impression wasn't that great of the server but I found myself playing more and more and now here I am
